title: Memories To Die For
description: Rachel Katz is trying to get back on her feet . . . personally and professionally. A forensic psychologist who works at the intersection of law and psychology; Rachel has almost convinced herself that this work is easier than being a therapist. It's less complicated - and there's no messy emotions, no crisis, and nothing unexpected.Rachel's safe, predictable existence is shaken up by the request to conduct a psychological autopsy on a colleague, Alix Price. Against her better judgment, Rachel accepts the assignment - even though her relationship with Alix had been one of constant conflict. Soon Rachel is using the investigation to avoid her growing attraction to the charismatic Anna Sigurdson. Rachel's personal and professional lives become intertwined - and eventually collide - in this psychological thriller by new author Adrian Gold. Cover: Sandy Knowles
author: Adrian Gold
